main event: Radar contacts on ground and air intercept radar tracked multiple unidentified metallic objects exhibiting erratic flight patterns.
interesting points: The sighting involved multiple objects (5 or more) detected at both high and low speeds,Some objects were observed hovering.,The exact nature and origin of the objects is still unknown,The investigation was conducted by the USAF under Project Blue Book,The sighting was recorded on 5-8-62 in the Aleutian Islands.
